summary.span: Discovers the attributes of a property and provides access to property metadata.

span.span: Discovers the attributes of a property and provides access to property metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是以邏輯方式與欄位相同。Properties are logically the same as fields. 屬性是一個具名的物件的狀態，其值是通常可透過層面`get`和`set`存取子。A property is a named aspect of an object's state whose value is typically accessible through `get` and `set` accessors. 屬性可能是唯讀的在此情況下不支援 set 常式。Properties may be read-only, in which case a set routine is not supported. > [!NOTE] > 若要判斷屬性是否`static`，您必須取得如`get`或`set`存取子，藉由呼叫或方法，並檢查其屬性。To determine whether a property is `static`, you must obtain the for the `get` or `set` accessor, by calling the or the method, and examine its property. 此類別中的數個方法會假設`get`存取子和`set`屬性存取子方法具有特定的格式。Several methods in this class assume that the `get` accessor and `set` accessor methods of a property have certain formats. 簽章`get`和`set`方法必須符合下列慣例：The signatures of the `get` and `set` methods must match the following convention: - 傳回型別`get`方法和最後一個引數`set`方法必須相同。The return type of the `get` method and the last argument of the `set` method must be identical. 這是屬性的型別。This is the type of the property. - `get`和`set`方法必須有相同的數字、 類型和順序的索引。The `get` and `set` methods must have the same number, type, and order of indices. 如果未遵照這種格式，則行為`GetValue`和`SetValue`方法未定義。If this format is not followed, the behavior of the `GetValue` and `SetValue` methods is undefined. 呼叫上`PropertyInfo`當`inherit`參數`GetCustomAttributes`是`true`不要走的型別階層。Calling on `PropertyInfo` when the `inherit` parameter of `GetCustomAttributes` is `true` does not walk the type hierarchy. 使用繼承自訂屬性。Use to inherit custom attributes. ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用不同的反映類別來分析組件中包含的中繼資料。This example shows how to use various reflection classes to analyze the metadata contained in an assembly. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例會產生約 55000 的資料行，您可以重新導向至文字檔案，在命令提示字元，如下所示： **example.exe > propertyinfo.txt**This example generates about 55,000 lines of data, which you can redirect to a text file at the command prompt, as follows: **example.exe > propertyinfo.txt** [!code-cpp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CPP/reflection.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CS/Reflection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/VB/Reflection.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回與所表示的屬性相關聯的屬性物件。The property returns the attributes associated with the property represented by this object. 屬性為主要是建立屬性時，編譯器所套用的修飾詞它們表示屬性是否預設屬性，`SpecialName`屬性，並依此類推。The attributes are primarily modifiers applied by a compiler when creating a property; they indicate whether a property is the default property, a `SpecialName` property, and so on. 請注意，幾乎所有的屬性，在.NET Framework 類別庫的值中的型別中找到屬性是。Note that, for almost all properties found in types in the .NET Framework class library, the value of the property is . > [!TIP] > 在大部分情況下，您可能想要擷取與屬性相關聯的自訂屬性。In most cases, you probably want to retrieve the custom attributes associated with a property. 若要這樣做，擷取的值屬性或呼叫其中一個多載方法。To do this, retrieve the value of the property, or call one of the overloads of the method. 若要取得屬性：To get the property: 1. 取得物件，表示屬性所屬的類型。Get a object that represents the type to which the property belongs. 2. 取得物件所呼叫的多載方法。Get the object by calling an overload of the method. 3. 擷取屬性的屬性，從屬性。Retrieve the property's attributes from the property. 您可以定義類型，建立以反映方式動態屬性的屬性發出呼叫的多載方法，並提供值`attributes`引數。You can define the attributes of a property for a type created dynamically using reflection emit by calling an overload of the method and supplying a value for the `attributes` argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會提供 managed 的編譯器和程式碼分析器的設計工具。This method is provided for designers of managed compilers and code analyzers. > [!NOTE] > 請勿在僅限反映的內容中，使用這個方法，因為它可能會導致執行的程式碼。Do not use this method in the reflection-only context, because it might cause code to execute. 請改用 方法。Use the method instead. 未受管理的中繼資料中的 Constant 資料表用來儲存常數值的欄位、 參數和屬性。In unmanaged metadata, the Constant table is used to store constant values for fields, parameters, and properties. 常數的資訊不會直接影響執行階段行為。Constant information does not directly influence runtime behavior. 編譯器會檢查這項資訊，在編譯時期，當匯入中繼資料。Compilers inspect this information, at compile time, when importing metadata. 如果使用，則編譯器會發出 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 資料流中內嵌常數的值。If used, the value of a constant is embedded in the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) stream the compiler emits. 有可用來在執行階段存取的 Constant 資料表不 MSIL 指令。There are no MSIL instructions that can be used to access the Constant table at run time. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關常數的值和常數的資料表的詳細資訊，請參閱 ECMA 第二篇文件。For more information on constant values and the Constant table, see the ECMA Partition II documentation. 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

exception.span: The Constant table in unmanaged metadata does not contain a constant value for the current property.

span.span: The Constant table in unmanaged metadata does not contain a constant value for the current property.

exception.span: The type of the value is not one of the types permitted by the Common Language Specification (CLS).

span.span: The type of the value is not one of the types permitted by the Common Language Specification (CLS).

exception.span: See the ECMA Partition II specification, Metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會提供 managed 的編譯器和程式碼分析器的設計工具。This method is provided for designers of managed compilers and code analyzers. 這個方法可以用於執行內容和僅限反映的內容。This method can be used in both the execution context and the reflection-only context. 未受管理的中繼資料中的 Constant 資料表用來儲存常數值的欄位、 參數和屬性。In unmanaged metadata, the Constant table is used to store constant values for fields, parameters, and properties. 常數的資訊不會直接影響執行階段行為。Constant information does not directly influence runtime behavior. 編譯器會檢查這項資訊，在編譯時期，當匯入中繼資料。Compilers inspect this information, at compile time, when importing metadata. 如果使用，則編譯器會發出 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 資料流中內嵌常數的值。If used, the value of a constant is embedded in the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) stream the compiler emits. 有可用來在執行階段存取的 Constant 資料表不 MSIL 指令。There are no MSIL instructions that can be used to access the Constant table at run time. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關常數的值和常數的資料表的詳細資訊，請參閱 ECMA 第二篇文件。For more information on constant values and the Constant table, see the ECMA Partition II documentation. 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您呼叫多載，來擷取非索引屬性的值; 如果您嘗試擷取索引之屬性的值，方法會擲回例外狀況。You call the overload to retrieve the value of a non-indexed property; if you try to retrieve the value of an indexed property, the method throws a exception. 您可以判斷是否屬性編製索引，或者不是藉由呼叫方法。You can determine whether a property is indexed or not by calling the method. 如果傳回的長度陣列為零，此屬性不會建立索引。If the length of the returned array is zero, the property is not indexed. 這是很便利的方法可提供實作抽象方法參數設為，則設定為`null`，物件的陣列索引值設為`null`，而設定為`null`。This is a convenience method that provides an implementation for the abstract method with the parameter set to , the set to `null`, the object array of index values set to `null`, and the set to `null`. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Planet`有兩個屬性的類別： `Name`，全球; 的名稱和`Distance`，地球行星的距離。The following example defines a `Planet` class that has two properties: `Name`, the name of the planet; and `Distance`, the planet's distance from Earth. 此範例會具現化`Planet`物件，代表全球 Jupiter，並將它傳遞給`GetPropertyValues`方法，以顯示資訊屬性，並使用方法來取得每個值`Planet`屬性。The example instantiates a `Planet` object that represents the planet Jupiter and passes it to a `GetPropertyValues` method that displays information about the properties and uses the method to get the value of each `Planet` property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷屬性是否會編製索引，請使用方法。To determine whether a property is indexed, use the method. 如果產生的陣列有 0 （零） 的項目，此屬性不會建立索引。If the resulting array has 0 (zero) elements, the property is not indexed. 這是很便利的方法可提供實作抽象`GetValue`方法`BindingFlags`參數`Default`，則`Binder`設定為`null`，和`CultureInfo`設為`null`。This is a convenience method that provides an implementation for the abstract `GetValue` method with a `BindingFlags` parameter of `Default`, the `Binder` set to `null`, and the `CultureInfo` set to `null`. 因為靜態屬性屬於型別，而不是個別物件，取得靜態屬性，藉由傳遞`null`做為物件引數。Because static properties belong to the type, not individual objects, get static properties by passing `null` as the object argument. 例如，使用下列程式碼，若要取得靜態`CurrentCulture`屬性`CultureInfo`:For example, use the following code to get the static `CurrentCulture` property of `CultureInfo` : ```csharp PropertyInfo CurCultProp = (typeof(CultureInfo)).GetProperty("CurrentCulture"); Console.WriteLine("CurrCult: " + CurCultProp.GetValue(null,null)); ``` 若要使用`GetValue`方法，先取得類別`Type`。To use the `GetValue` method, first get the class `Type`. 從`Type`，取得`PropertyInfo`。From the `Type`, get the `PropertyInfo`. 從`PropertyInfo`，使用`GetValue`方法。From the `PropertyInfo`, use the `GetValue` method. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用成員的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得索引屬性的值。The following example shows how to get the value of an indexed property. 屬性是預設屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 的類別。The property is the default property (the indexer in C#) of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷特定屬性的型別，執行下列作業：To determine the type of a particular property, do the following: 1. 取得物件，表示包含屬性的型別 （類別或結構）。Get a object that represents the type (the class or structure) that contains the property. 如果您正在使用的物件 （類型的執行個體），您可以呼叫其方法。If you are working with an object (an instance of a type), you can call its method. 否則，您可以使用 C# 運算子，或 Visual Basic 運算子，與範例說明。Otherwise, you can use the C# operator or the Visual Basic operator, as the example illustrates. 2. 取得物件，表示您感興趣的屬性。Get a object that represents the property in which you're interested. 您可以藉由取得的所有屬性，從陣列方法，然後逐一查看的項目陣列，或者您可以擷取物件，表示屬性直接藉由呼叫方法並指定屬性名稱。You can do this by getting an array of all properties from the method and then iterating the elements in the array, or you can retrieve the object that represents the property directly by calling the method and specifying the property name. 3. 擷取值屬性從物件。Retrieve the value of the property from the object. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Employee`有五個屬性的類別。The following example defines an `Employee` class that has five properties. 它會使用擷取的陣列則表示這些屬性，並顯示的名稱和每個類型的物件。It then uses retrieves an array of objects that represent those properties and displays the name and type of each. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列範例宣告名為類別`Example`與其中一個`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中) 和一個執行個體屬性。The following example declares a class named `Example` with one `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) and one instance property. 此範例會使用方法，以變更原始屬性值，並且顯示原始值和最終值。The example uses the method to change the original property values and displays the original and final values. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列範例會定義名為類別`TestClass`具有名為讀寫屬性`Caption`。The following example defines a class named `TestClass` that has a read-write property named `Caption`. 它會顯示的預設值`Caption`屬性時，會呼叫方法，以變更屬性值，並顯示結果。It displays the default value of the `Caption` property, calls the method to change the property value, and displays the result. [!code-cpp[Classic PropertyInfo.SetValue1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PropertyInfo.SetValue1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PropertyInfo.SetValue1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PropertyInfo.SetValue1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PropertyInfo.SetValue1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PropertyInfo.SetValue1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 請注意，因為`Caption`屬性不是參數陣列`index`引數是`null`。Note that, because the `Caption` property is not a parameter array, the `index` argument is `null`. 下列範例宣告名為類別`Example`具有三個屬性：`static`屬性 (`Shared` Visual Basic 中)，一個執行個體的屬性和一個索引的執行個體屬性。The following example declares a class named `Example` with three properties: a `static` property (`Shared` in Visual Basic), an instance property, and an indexed instance property. 此範例會使用方法，以變更的屬性和顯示原始值和最終值的預設值。The example uses the method to change the default values of the properties and displays the original and final values. 用來搜尋，使用反映索引的執行個體屬性的名稱是不同的語言而定，並且會套用至屬性的屬性。The name that is used to search for an indexed instance property with reflection is different depending on the language and on attributes applied to the property. - 在 Visual Basic 中的屬性名稱永遠用來搜尋具有反映的屬性。In Visual Basic, the property name is always used to search for the property with reflection. 您可以使用`Default`關鍵字來將屬性設為預設值編製索引的屬性，在此情況下時，可以省略名稱存取的屬性，如此範例所示。You can use the `Default` keyword to make the property a default indexed property, in which case you can omit the name when accessing the property, as in this example. 您也可以使用屬性名稱。You can also use the property name. - 在 C# 中，索引的執行個體屬性是名為索引子的預設屬性，並存取程式碼中的屬性時，永遠不會使用的名稱。In C#, the indexed instance property is a default property called an indexer, and the name is never used when accessing the property in code. 根據預設，屬性的名稱是`Item`，以及當您搜尋使用反映的屬性時，您必須使用該名稱。By default, the name of the property is `Item`, and you must use that name when you search for the property with reflection. 您可以使用，索引子以不同名稱的屬性。You can use the attribute to give the indexer a different name. 在這個範例中，名稱為 `IndexedInstanceProperty`。In this example, the name is `IndexedInstanceProperty`. - C + +`default`規範可以用來進行索引之屬性的預設索引屬性 （類別索引子）。In C++, the `default` specifier can be used to make an indexed property a default indexed property (class indexer). 在此情況下，預設屬性的名稱是`Item`，以及當您搜尋使用反映，如此範例所示的屬性時，您必須使用該名稱。In that case, the name of the property by default is `Item`, and you must use that name when you search for the property with reflection, as in this example. 您可以使用屬性設為類別索引子的設定，不同的名稱在反映中，但您無法使用該名稱來存取程式碼中的屬性。You can use the attribute to give the class indexer a different name in reflection, but you cannot use that name to access the property in code. 索引的屬性不是類別索引子存取使用它的名稱，在程式碼和反映。An indexed property that is not a class indexer is accessed using its name, both in code and in reflection. [!code-cpp[PropertyInfo.SetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PropertyInfo.SetValue/cpp/Example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PropertyInfo.SetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PropertyInfo.SetValue/cs/Example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PropertyInfo.SetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PropertyInfo.SetValue/vb/Example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個物件是實值類型和`value`是`null`，則屬性會設為該類型的預設值。If this object is a value type and `value` is `null`, then the property will be set to the default value for that type. 若要判斷屬性是否會編製索引，請使用方法。To determine whether a property is indexed, use the method. 如果產生的陣列有 0 （零） 的項目，此屬性不會建立索引。If the resulting array has 0 (zero) elements, the property is not indexed. 完全信任程式碼會略過存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可以存取和完全信任程式碼時，透過反映叫用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked via Reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. 若要使用`SetValue`方法，先取得類別`Type`。To use the `SetValue` method, first get the class `Type`. 從`Type`，取得`PropertyInfo`。From the `Type`, get the `PropertyInfo`. 從`PropertyInfo`，使用`SetValue`方法。From the `PropertyInfo`, use the `SetValue` method. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用成員的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
